Articles.Content: Floor 4133: You see the prospect of a new page and hope your guess is right.

Floor 4133: Clowns.

Spoiler

Floor 4134: Crazy Meg and Wacky Bob watch their child graduate highschool

172608152023
Floor 4135: The police tell us to stop following Crazy Meg and Wacky Bob around.

Floor 4136: Crazy Meg and Wacky Bobs first childs engagement party!

175308152023
Floor 4137: Crazy Meg and Wacky Bobs (whose surname is "Hilarious") 50th wedding anniversary is being celebrated.

Floor 4138: A memorial to Wacky Bob “Beloved Husband and Father” aged 84. Crazy Meg states He was a great man, great father and very Wacky.

065508162023

Floor 4139: Here we find the service for "Megan Hilarious", died age 92.

The stone reads "In commemoration to the Nut that was Meg, Beloved Mother, Grandmother and Great Grandmother."

The service is attended by a very large gathering of extended family and 100 Squirrels.

It is being held under an enormous Oak Tree and acorns are everywhere.
Floor 4140: a lot of people clapping
Floor 4141: a break from the family tree.

Floor 4142: Silly Sally Granddaughter to Crazy Meg announces her engagement to Stupendous Tom.

192608162023

Floor 4143: A Hens party for the youngest granddaughter Silly Sally. Her older sisters who already are married with kids of their own are in attendance. They are Glorious Gloria and Funloving Fran. Your observations lead you to believe that Sally is going to have a big hangover the next day.

A small part of your brain is trying to warn you that some sort of time dialation is in effect, almost as if the higher you go, the closer you are getting to an event horizon.

Edited August 17, 2023 by ColdJ

Floor 4144: the wedding of Silly Sally and Stupendous Tom, glorious Gloria is Maid of Honor and Funloving Fran is a bridesmaid

060008172023

Floor 4145: A hospital waiting room where family are waiting to hear about the birth of Sallys first child.

Edited August 17, 2023 by ColdJ

Floor 4146: Maternity Ward, Silly Sally gives birth to a child, a health baby girl, named Megan in honor of her great grandmother.

060908172023
Floor 4147: Stupedous Tom coaching their kids football team on a cold Sunday morning.

Floor 4148: Stupendous Tom watches as his team wins their first game of the season

063208172023
Floor 4149: A family gathering with over 500 attending. The BBQ is working overtime.
Floor 4150: A exhaust cleaning area for all the BBQ fumes.
Floor 4151: A farm to supply food for the BBQ.

Floor 4152: Silly Sallies daughter Crazy Meg starting 5th grade.

224508172023
Floor 4153: The set where they shot "100 Things to do Before High School".

Floor 4154: a lone person staring into the distance

044808192023

050508192023

Edited August 19, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Floor 4155: A room full of cancelled NASA plans and programs. You look through them all and feel very saddened at the sight of all these brilliant concepts and great ideas that were shelved because of budget and politics. *sighs*

Floor 4156: the as yet unknown NASA employee who will command Hubble to deorbit at mission end.

193408192023
